EmailTemplate.description: ERB - STANDARD RESPONSE TO CONFIRM IF ASSET IS DUAL RELEASED
EmailTemplate.name: ERB - STANDARD RESPONSE TO CONFIRM IF ASSET IS DUAL RELEASED
EmailTemplate.subject: Requesting Account Set Up - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please advise when rental asset is returned to service and provide copy of (FAA/EASA) dual release certificate.
OPTIONAL: Please advise if rental asset is long term preserved (LTP) and crated for shipment.
Do not remove the reference # from the subject line from this email chain.
Please always reply to EngineRentals@Honeywell.com for all responses.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerName__c} {!Case.OwnerTitle}
Honeywell Engine Rental Bank 1-800-601-3099 (Within US and Canada) 00800-601-30999 (Within Europe) 602-365-3099 (All other countries) EngineRentals@Honeywell.com
Please reference Honeywell's Engine Rental Bank website for all rental documents.https://commerce.honeywell.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/eSystemDisplay?catalogId=10201&storeId=10651&categoryId=42993&langId=-1
